#summary Where to find client library samples
#labels Featured

To run the samples, simply unzip the client library distribution to a web accessible directory on a server that supports PHP.  

View the source of each sample in the 
[http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-php-client/source/browse/#svn/trunk/src/examples/ /src/examples] directory:

  * Fetch a user and their friends, displaying profile information: ([http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-php-client/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/listFriends.php listFriends.php])
  * Read and write appData: ([http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-php-client/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/appData.php appData.php])
  * Read and write activities: ([http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-php-client/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/activities.php activities.php])
  * Send messages: ([http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-php-client/source/browse/trunk/src/examples/messages.php messages.php])

Additionally, check out the unit tests in the [http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-php-client/source/browse/#svn/trunk/test /test] directory for more examples of how to use the library.
